March 15 5
James Haggard
Burksville Ky
Sir
Yours of the 13th ultimo to Gov Bramlette has been received & refered to this office for answer
It is not deemed advisable at present to increase the number of State troops already in the field. If in the future, it is determined to raise more your recommendation will receive due attention

Very Respectfuly
D W Lindsey
Adjutant General of Ky
